short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comtura captures next steps, stakeholders, and relevant info from sales calls and pushes it to your CRM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comtura automates data entry into Salesforce (and in future, other CRM’s) by analysing your customer calls. Applying your sales playbook information to extract the relevant information such as pain points, buyer intent and next steps from your calls. We map these signals to your CRM fields to seamlessly update Salesforce. We automate picklist selections, date inputs as well as provide AI powered suggestions for you or your sales team to have the highest integrity of CRM data in your Salesforce. Comtura’s AI listens and learns from every call to improve over time using Machine Learning. Spend less time typing and clicking and more time selling today with Comtura.
